title: Hags
subtitle: Accursed denizens of the foulest swamps

Peoples: Vengful and full to their core of spite and hatred, their are greatly feared for their mastery of curses, hexes and the foulest of the magics of vengence.
Geography: Isolated and disagreeable they hold court of the great swamplands, hiding away in the deepest crevices, few choose to risk open contact with the other races.
